beans.description:
#BeanLifeCycle We can implement beanLifeCycle in 3 ways . 1)Programmatic Approach (By Implement InitializingBean,DisposableBean Interfaces in Pojo classes) 2)Declarative Approach (By using "init-method" ,"destroy-method" in bean element) 3)Annotation Approach (By Using @PostConstruct and @PreDestroy )[To activate these annotation we can use CommonAnnotationBeanPostProcessor class]
Note : If you want apply for all beans ,then we can use "default-init-method" and "default-destroy-method" in beans element
